title: Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Long Sleeve

reviews.customers_say: Customers find this dress stylish, with one mentioning it's fancy enough for weddings or date nights, and another noting it can be worn with both boots and heels. Customers describe it as comfortable, flattering, and true-to-size, with one noting it doesn't accentuate back fat.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Burnt orange dress
items.body: Beautiful dress. Fit perfect. I’m 5’3 ordered a small. True to size. Love this dress. Read more
items.author: sherri

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Elegant and classy
items.body: Beautiful dress and it fits perfectly! Very flattering and elegant. Read more
items.author: Ryan H

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Looks just like the pic
items.body: I'm 5'5, 138 lbs and the medium fits as expected. Nice flowy fabric, tight ribbed bodice is not scratchy. It hits me above the knees, will look cute with long boots for a winter wedding in TX. The emerald green is just as pictured online. Read more
items.author: S.B.

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Super cute
items.body: I'm a die hard Lulus buyer. I was looking for a dress to change into for my wedding reception. I found one on lulus that looks almost identical to this one but twice the price and two inches shorter. I'm a tall girl. I have long legs and typically choose to sway away from short dresses because they end up looking REALLY short on me. A small was my recommended size but I ordered a medium for a little extra length for my legs and arms. The medium is perfect. The dress is a bit see through which im not worried about because i plan on wearing nude spanx under it anyway. The quality is good. And the dress is SO cute! I'm really happy with this purchase. Read more
items.author: Juliya Lehnen

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect, easy dress to slip on!
items.body: Perfect for fall wedding shower. Comfortable and lightweight. Good length- not too short but above knee on a 5'7" woman. Read more
items.author: Henny

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars If you like static cling...
items.body: If you like static cling - this dress is for you! I love the style and design but the material is horrendous. There is not enough static guard in the world to keep you from feeling like youre wrapped up in saran wrap. Will be returning. Read more
items.author: MannaBelle

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lovely, size down one
items.body: Positives: Color is beautiful, quality exceptional, perfect for work, fall pics, so versatile! Sleeves, breast area and length were to long for my preferences, made me look like a bag lady… a cute, well dressed bag lady, however still a bag lady. (For reference I am 5’7, 180 pounds.) I did have to return due to sizing too large. I recommend ordering a size down. Giving 5 stars because it is an excellent staple for this fall! Read more
items.author: Elizabeth H. (USA)

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Adorable, comfortable, well fitting!
items.body: I wore this to a wedding and it was perfect. Very comfortable and trendy, I got a lot of great compliments on it. The color is very pretty rose, and the dots are unique and tufted. The size fit perfect, and is a great value for the money. I can wear it again to another event. It wasn’t see through at all! Read more
items.author: Molly Lola

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Bean Paste Red, Red Brown, Blue, Apricot, Army Green, Black, Dark Green, Red, Rose Red, Navy, Wine Red, Khaki, Pink, White. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
